[album_gui_plugins]
boolean = album.gui.widgets.argument_widget_plugins:create_gui_boolean
directory = album.gui.widgets.argument_widget_plugins:create_gui_directory
double = album.gui.widgets.argument_widget_plugins:create_gui_double
file = album.gui.widgets.argument_widget_plugins:create_gui_file
float = album.gui.widgets.argument_widget_plugins:create_gui_float
integer = album.gui.widgets.argument_widget_plugins:create_gui_integer
string = album.gui.widgets.argument_widget_plugins:create_gui_string

[console_parsers_album]
add-shortcut = album.gui.commandline:create_parser_shortcut
gui = album.gui.commandline:create_parser_gui
